name: Beat Signal
description:
BEATSIGNAL

Welcome to this little game, where you can destroy walls to to the beat. 

But be sure to keep the signal to metronome, or you will lose!

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to destroy walls around you

This game was made for the MiniJam 125 : Signal, where the limitation was Everything is tied to the rhythm.
